name: Pulsar Harvester
description: This module weakens enemies by reducing their level stats through projectile hits, making them progressively easier to defeat.

context_fields.when_to_use: When facing high-level enemies and need progressive weakening effects
context_fields.upgrade_priority: Focus on higher rarity versions for better proc chance
synergy_combinations: Attack speed for more projectile hits
Damage bonuses for faster enemy defeat
context_fields.resource_efficiency: Medium - utility focused, not direct damage

notes: Pulsar Harvester has diminishing returns after reducing 100 levels on an enemy
unique_effect: Each time a projectile hits an enemy, there is a [x]% chance that it will reduce the enemy's Health and Attack level by 1 (diminishing returns after 100 reductions)
